rule.name: MistypedUnicodeCharacter
rule.message: Matches a 16 bit unicode character, and not a 24 bit Unicode chacter, as you may think
rule.description: Be aware of Unicode codepoint followed by [09A-F].
rule.example: \u12340 doesn't mean code point 0x12340, but instead 0x1234 followed by the character 0
